Dry Bath Incubator

Thermal Control & Accessories

Reliable Heating & Cooling in a Compact Design Designed for modern laboratories, SJ Lab Dry Bath Incubators deliver accurate temperature control with interchangeable aluminum blocks, supporting a wide range of sample types and workflows.

Block Options

Multiple aluminum blocks

Precise temperature control with interchangeable aluminum blocks for flexible laboratory applications.

Interchangeable Aluminum Blocks

  • High thermal conductivity aluminum alloy

  • Anodized surface for durability and corrosion resistance

  • Uniform heating across all sample positions

  • Available for tubes, vials and microplates
